TITLE: Platform Features
SUBTITLE: Our platform offers your business the neccesary tools to begin the data privacy compliance journey
BULLET_POINTS.THIRD_PARTY_BLOCKING.TITLE: Third party blocking
BULLET_POINTS.MULTILANGUAGE.TITLE: Multi-language
BULLET_POINTS.MULTILANGUAGE.DESCRIPTION: Our banner displays consent options in english, spanish, and portuguese automatically, If your user cant understand the notice, then their consent is not valid.
BULLET_POINTS.DATA_RIGHTS.TITLE: Data rights
BULLET_POINTS.DATA_RIGHTS.DESCRIPTION: Give your users the ability to request removal and treatment of their own personal information managed by your company.
BULLET_POINTS.CUSTOMIZATION.TITLE: Customization
BULLET_POINTS.CUSTOMIZATION.DESCRIPTION: Change the colors and display format of your banner to match your website's design.
BULLET_POINTS.CONSENT_OPTIMIZATION.TITLE: Consent Optimization
BULLET_POINTS.CONSENT_OPTIMIZATION.DESCR: Wibson automatically displays and enforces the correct consent requirements based on the geolocation of each user.
BULLET_POINTS.MULTISITES.TITLE: Multi-sites
BULLET_POINTS.MULTISITES.DESCRIPTION: You can add the banner to as many sites as you want.
BULLET_POINTS.POLICY_CREATOR.TITLE: Cookie and Privacy Policy creator
BULLET_POINTS.POLICY_CREATOR.DESCRIPTION: No need for expensive lawyers! Create your own custom privacy and cookie policy with our platform.
BULLET_POINTS.CONSENT_LOGS.TITLE: Consent Logs
BULLET_POINTS.CONSENT_LOGS.DESCIPTION: Wibson allows companies to track and store every consent made through our banner. We store consent logs in an encrypted database and these records can be used as proof of consent in case of legal action.
BULLET_POINTS.ADMIN_PANEL.TITLE: Admin Panel
